section.title: Project Structure
section.para: There is a parent project composed of two child Maven modules. This is because PerfCake Agent installs into the application under inspection and needs to be compiled with an older Java version because of compatibility reasons.

Because of the split into multiple child modules, there is a need to run mvn install -DskipTests
to install the parent module into your local repository when working on the devel Git branch.
parfcake Core PerfCake module, contains all the code needed to build the product.
perfcake-agent JVM Agent to be used when running target application (application under inspection) with memory monitoring. This module is compiled with an older Java version (1.5).
